00034    namespace Exceptions
00035    {
00037       class Exception: public std::exception
00038       {
00039       public:
00040          virtual const char* what() const throw() =0;
00041          ~Exception() throw() {}
00042       };
00043       
00045       class Request: public Exception
00046       {
00047       public:
00049 
00052          Request(Protocol::FullId id_): id(id_) { }
00053          ~Request() throw() {}
00054          
00055          virtual const char* what() const throw() =0;
00056          Protocol::FullId getId() const throw() { return id; }
00057       protected:
00059          Protocol::FullId id;
00060       };

00064       {

00067 
00070          Param(Protocol::FullId id_);

00075          std::string msg;
00076       };

00099
